channel.title: Indicator Methodology - Consultation Calls
channel.description:
The IATI Secretariat has set aside time on Wednesday 18th November, Monday 23rd November and Wednesday 25th November to discuss the indicator methodology.
If you would like to participate please add your details and availability ***[here][1]***
Do not feel obliged to fit in with others' poll options, we are happy to do brief one-to-one-calls in addition to group consultations.
[1]: http://doodle.com/poll/drr4a9zwhk9fqzg7
